dcterms:description: A dataset containing 480 news articles across six domains (Technology, Business, Education, Sports, Politics, and Entertainment) collected through manual and crowdsourcing annotation efforts, used for fake news detection.
dcterms:title: Fake News AMT

dcterms:description: A dataset containing 500 celebrity news articles collected from various online magazines, used for fake news detection.
dcterms:title: Celebrity
